Mummies don't lie. en.wikipedia.org------------------------------------------------------- CAIRO-- Egyptian antiquities supremo Zahi Hawass insisted Tuesday that Tutankhamun was not black despite calls by US black activists to recognize the boy king's dark skin color. Tutankhamun was not black, and the portrayal of ancient Egyptian civilization as black has no element of truth to it, Zahi Hawass told reporters. CAIRO.
